videos.title: 📘 What is Golang? | Fast & Powerful Language Explained in 1 Min!
videos.description:
🔥 Learn what Go (Golang) is in just 1 minute!

✅ Open-source, super-fast, and built by Google
✅ Designed for modern backend, cloud & system-level development
✅ Compiled, clean, and concurrency-ready

🎯 Perfect for interviews and quick tech revisions!

#golang #interviewprep #backenddevelopment #shorts #codingtips #goprogramming
videos.playlistName: Golang Interview Shorts 🔥 | 1 Go Qn a Day | Crack Interviews Fast

videos.title: 👨‍💻 Who Created Golang? Meet the Legends Behind Go!
videos.description:
🤓 Curious about who created Golang?

👨‍💻 Robert Griesemer, Rob Pike & Ken Thompson
💡 Born at Google in 2007
🚀 Open sourced in 2009

📌 Learn the story in under a minute!
#golang #kenThompson #programminglegends #interviewshorts #codingfacts

videos.title: 💭 Why Was Golang Created? (Real Engineering Problems Solved!)
videos.description:
📌 Why did Google create Go?

⚙️ Slow compilation in C++?
🚫 Lack of concurrency in Java & Python?
✅ Go = Simple, Fast, and Concurrent

💬 Learn the real-world motivation in this quick video!

#golang #goprogramming #interviewprep #shorts #backenddevelopment

videos.title: ✨ Key Features of Golang in 60 Seconds!
videos.description:
⚡ Explore the power of Golang in just 60 seconds!

✅ Fast Compilation
✅ Built-in Concurrency (Goroutines)
✅ Garbage Collection
✅ Simplicity & Clean Syntax
✅ Cross-platform & Rich Standard Library

🎓 Great for interviews & dev quick tips!
